subps = 2, 2
cborient = 'vertical'
plt.subplot(2, 2, 1)
plt.imshow(pim, **kw1s)
plt.colorbar(orientation=cborient)
plt.title('Base image')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 2)
plt.imshow(subim, **kw2s)
plt.colorbar(orientation=cborient)
plt.title('PSF subtracted image')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 3)
plt.imshow(im, **kw3s)
plt.colorbar(orientation=cborient)
plt.title('Real noise-free images')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 4)
plt.imshow(pim - subim, **kw4s)
plt.colorbar(orientation=cborient)
plt.title('PSF images')
plt.show()
